text: no mucho, pero un poco si

Happy Wednesday! :camel: I have a Community user who is looking for some assistance with the boarders around their website in mobile; they've provided a link and the code they're working with: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Mobile-Optimization-for-Multiple-Pages/m-p/258673#M11429>. any tips, tricks, suggestions or next steps for the user would be greatly appreciated!! Have a great day!!
